text:
We can see this everywhere around us.  

In his book How the Mighty Fall, Jim Collins explores failure.  

He studies companies that were once favorites of Wall Street.  

These companies later collapsed.  

He finds that many fell into "the undisciplined pursuit of more."  

This was a key reason for their failure.  

This is true for companies and for the people who work in them.  

But why?

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The undisciplined pursuit of more leads to failure for both companies and individuals.
